# Harmonize (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Races of Stone (WotC), pg 162

You blend magic and music seamlessly. While this spell is in effect, starting a bardic music effect requires only a move action. Concentrating on a bardic music effect that requires concentration still requires a standard action.
